item.title: Keanu Reeves Saved Fast & Furious Director's New Indie Movie After Running Into Trouble: "We Have Angels Along The Way"
item.description: Keanu Reeves saved a Fast & Furious director's indie movie after it ran into financial trouble, who rejoices, "We have angels along the way."

item.title: How Star Wars Fixed Boba Fett's Backstory After Attack Of The Clones Finally Revealed His Origin
item.description: Boba Fett's Attack of the Clones origin seemingly gave him a contradictory background, yet creatives found clever ways to keep everything canon.

item.title: Disney Is About To Rewrite Alien’s Canon In A Way That Not Even Ridley Scott’s Prometheus Did
item.description: Alien's upcoming TV series Alien: Earth promises to finally do the one thing that even Ridley Scott's prequel Prometheus could never quite pull off.
